input.sentences: we took all of our family up to the farm for the reunion .
everybody was there . there were so many people .
one of my uncles set up a keyboard for some music .
afterward we all made tents so we could sleep .
output.sentences: It was that time again, the annual family reunion back home
There was a great turn out this year.
Everyone was chatting and catching up.
Some family even brought musical instruments and played a gig for us all.
As the evening drew on we started getting the tents ready for sleeping in.
